answers.answer: thanks to all ..........love all the new name changes.....peekawho. by the way what happend??? haven't seen u around long time missed u girly (((hugs)))....& harley we thought we would have been drinking for christmas..........oh well brand new baby for the new year righ..*wink*.....thanks to all the lovely ladies.....love i$landpr!nce$$

my update is that i made a date for my fiance to go to the doctor....he's finally made up his mind....i will go with him & check myself as well.......so early januray we will do that....then we're still in full swing with the wedding plans...i got the venue.....not wat i wanted but at least is better than nothing......my family is behind us 100% with helping.......not to sure bout his.:(....i'm not even sure if i would be able to update to guys about my wedding later on  cuz i wouldn't be working here again in next 2 weeks..........so where ever my next job is if i have my own pc you guys would be the first to know...any way dats whats new with me so far
I guess she's not gonna tell me...
Love the dollar signs in your name now!  Merry Christmas to you, too.(the former who_dis)

sorry hon.......no i haven't left yet, i'm not quiting if it was up to me i would stay here forever but i can't b/cuz i'm on contract....& next week is my last...i had a luncheon yesterday so dats y i didn't answer ......:)

Jordan arrived safe on 11/29!!!! He's so handsome :) Jesse loves him & wants to hold him all the time:) Oh my sad news is my doggy of 17yrs passed away Tuesday :( but I know he's better off I just miss him so much already!!!!!!! Have a Merry Christmas!!!!!!! Glad to hear from u!!! Take Care
